      • readClassificationSet

        public void readClassificationSet(java.lang.String datasetFile,
                                  boolean train)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        It reads the whole input data-set and it stores each example and its associated output value in local arrays to ease their use.
        Parameters:
        datasetFile - String name of the file containing the dataset
        train - boolean It must have the value "true" if we are reading the training data-set
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there ocurs any problem with the reading of the data-set

        It copies the header of the dataset
        Returns:
        String A string containing all the data-set information

        public int[] tiposVar()
        Returns the type of each input attribute (NOMINAL = 0 OR NUMERIC = 1)
        Returns:
        int[] Vector with binary values, indicating if the attributes are nominal or numeric.

      • dameRangos

        public double[][] dameRangos()
        Returns the minimum and maximum values of every attributes as a matrix. The matrix has a size of number_of_attributes x 2 ([nAttributes][2]). The minimum value is located at the first position of each array and the maximum, at the second.
        Returns:
        Matrix which stores the minimum and maximum values of every attributes.
